name: Blobs (N0t3nl1sh)
description:
Eat the blobs and become big.

I made this game while fighting my laptop because it was randomly giving me blue screens for absouletely no reason at all. This isn't a great game but you can check out Piglin Mayhem and Virus Fighter they are better games than this game.

https://n0t3nl1sh.itch.io/piglin-mayhem

https://n0t3nl1sh.itch.io/virusfighter
